event.title: were found in pasta sauce at a Sizzler restaurant in Brisbane's inner-west on January 20

data.event: Police said green pellets were found in pasta sauce at a Sizzler restaurant in Brisbane's inner-west on January 20.

event.title: were found in a vegetable soup at Sizzler's Myer Centre outlet in the city about 5pm on Saturday

data.event: Similar pellets were found in a vegetable soup at Sizzler's Myer Centre outlet in the city about 5pm on Saturday.
